Buildout recipes for Tipfy web framework
========================================

Carlo Pires <carlopires@gmail.com>
Ter 15 Mar 2011 17:45:04 BRT 

This package is a collection of recipes put
together to help starting a tipfy project using
buildout.

To see how they can be used check:
	http://code.google.com/p/tipfy-project/
	
Latest version on:
	http://code.google.com/p/tipfyrecipes/
